name: engagedmd-api-poc

scripts.encrypt-env: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),crypto=require('crypto'); const pass=process.argv[1]; if(!pass){console.error('Usage: npm run encrypt-env -- <passphrase>');process.exit(1);} const plaintext=fs.readFileSync('.env'); const salt=crypto.randomBytes(16); const key=crypto.scryptSync(pass,salt,32); const iv=crypto.randomBytes(12); const cipher=crypto.createCipheriv('aes-256-gcm',key,iv); const enc=Buffer.concat([cipher.update(plaintext),cipher.final()]); const tag=cipher.getAuthTag(); const out=Buffer.concat([salt,iv,tag,enc]).toString('base64'); fs.writeFileSync('.env.encrypted',out);"
scripts.decrypt-env: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),crypto=require('crypto'); const pass=process.argv[1]; if(!pass){console.error('Usage: npm run decrypt-env -- <passphrase>');process.exit(1);} const b=Buffer.from(fs.readFileSync('.env.encrypted','utf8'),'base64'); const salt=b.subarray(0,16),iv=b.subarray(16,28),tag=b.subarray(28,44),data=b.subarray(44); const key=crypto.scryptSync(pass,salt,32); const decipher=crypto.createDecipheriv('aes-256-gcm',key,iv); decipher.setAuthTag(tag); const dec=Buffer.concat([decipher.update(data),decipher.final()]); fs.writeFileSync('.env',dec);"

author: Greg Brooks <gb_sea@icloud.com>
description: POC system that integrations with EngagedMD external API
